quote: Well, technically, chemistry is the study of matter. But I prefer to see it as the study of change.
Finding myself awake at three in the morning. But you know what? Ever since my diagnosis, I sleep just fine.
You know what Walt? Someone needs to protect this family from the man who protects this family.
To all law enforcement entities, this is not an admission of guilt.
I have spent my whole life scared, frightened of things that could happen, might happen, might not happen, fifty years I spent like that.
I told you, Skyler, I warned you for a solid year: you cross me, and there will be consequences.

I need support. Me, the almost 40-year-old pregnant woman with a surprise baby on the way. And the husband with lung cancer who disappears for hours on end, and I do not know where he goes and he barely even speaks to me anymore.
What I came to realize is that fear, that is the worst of it. That is the real enemy. So, get up, get out in the real world and you kick that bastard as hard you can right in the teeth.

The fun is over. From here on out, I am Mr. Low Profile. Just another douche bag with a job and three pairs of Dockers. If I am lucky, month from now, best-case scenario, I am managing a Cinnabon in Omaha.
I am speaking to my family now. Skyler, you are the love of my life. I hope you know that.
Some straight like you, giant stick up his ass, age what, 60? He is just gonna break bad?
Even government doesnot care that much about quality. You know what is okay to put in hot dogs?
Oh, hey, nerdiest old dude I know, you wanna come cook crystal? Please. I would ask my diaper-wearing granny, but her wheelchair would not fit in the RV.
The moral of the story is I chose a half measure when I should have gone all the way. I will never make that mistake again. No more half measures, Walter.
Is this just a genetic thing with you? Is it congenital? Did your mother drop you on your head when you were a baby?
And a man, a man provides. And he does it even when he is not appreciated, or respected, or even loved. He simply bears up and he does it. Because he is a man.
You are not the guy. You are not capable of being the guy. I had a guy, but now I do not. You are not the guy.
I watched Jane die. I was there. And I watched her die. I watched her overdose and choke to death. I could have saved her. But I did not.
Smoking marijuana, eating Cheetos, and masturbating do not constitute plans in my book.
I have lived under the threat of death for a year now. And because of that, I have made choices.
Walt, please, lets both of us stop trying to justify this whole thing and admit you are in danger!
Darth Vader had responsibilities. He was responsible for the Death Star.
Sometimes the forbidden fruit tastes the sweetest.
I do not believe fear to be an effective motivator. I want investment. For now, I am simply interested in time frame.
The one that says if I canot kill you, you will sure as *beep* wish you were dead.
You won, Walter. You got the job. Do yourself a favor and learn to take yes for an answer.
The thing is, if you just do stuff and nothing happens, what is it all mean? What is the point? Oh right, this whole thing is about self-acceptance.
You are a time bomb, tick-tick-ticking. And I have no intention of being around for the boom.
A guy opens his door and gets shot and you think that of me? No. I am the one who knocks!
Someone has to protect this family from the man who protects this family.
I am not in the meth business. I am in the empire business.
You all know exactly who I am. Say my name.
I did it for me. I liked it. I was good at it. And, I was really. I was alive.
Do you know how much I make a year? I mean, even if I told you, you would not believe it.
So you do have a plan? Yeah, Mr. White! Yeah, science!
Clearly, his taste in women is the same as his taste in lawyers.
I am not saying it is not bad. It is bad. But it could be worse.
I will kill your wife, I will kill your son, I will kill your infant daughter.
You are the smartest guy I ever met, and you are too stupid to see he made up his mind 10 minutes ago.
All I can do is wait for the cancer to come back.
Put me on your magical boat, man, and sail me down your chocolaty river of meth!
Sometimes it just feels better not to talk. At all. About anything. To anyone.
You are not the guy. You are not capable of being the guy. I had a guy but now I do not. You are not the guy.
Name one thing in this world that is non negotiable.
I have spent my whole life scared frightened of things that could happen, might happen, might not happen.
Now, hey, remember, not all learning comes out of books.
Jesse, you asked me if I was in the meth business or the money business. Neither. I am in the empire business.
My friends, I promise you that together, we will prosper.
Now look buddy, the last thing I want to do is get you in hot water, but some meth monkey had a feeding frenzy in my yard a few days ago.
